external.description:
Alt: Honestly MrPowerShell started as a reference to other tech monikers.  Enough old colleagues watched MsExcel and joked that I would be MrPowerShell.

I still kinda bristle with it, but it fits.

I've been doing PowerShell for decades and have written over 27,000,000 lines of code ( and counting ).

So if I am not MrPowerShell, who is?

Equally importantly, does anyone else have any "right" to tell me differently about something I helped make and have been doing for decades?
external.title: rick and morty are sitting at a table with the words " this guy gets it " on the bottom

record.text: Finally someone who understands why I picked the name ðŸ˜‚
